quest.name: Back to Business
journal: Gerbod is looking to return to his craft.
objectives: Deliver the worn artisan's tools to Gerbod.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: Well, you've the look of a capable lasslad who don't blink in the face o' danger. Might you be willin' to help a man down on his luck?

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: I used to be a carpenter, you see, an' I made my livin' fixin' the wagons of all the caravans what used to pass through Ala Ghiri. When the Garleans took over, the merchants fled, along with all my business.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: I did what I could to make ends meet after that, but now that we're free o' those imperial dogs, I'd like to dust off my tools an' do what I can to help the resistance.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: Trouble is, my tools aren't here─I hid them away at Goodblade, or what's left of it. I'd go myself, but the place has been overrun with all manner of unsightly creatures. I'd never make it out o' there alive.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: That's where you come in. I want you to check the crates there an' bring back any o' my tools you can find. I'm countin' on you.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: I hid my tools all over, so I'm afraid you'll have to do a bit o' searchin'. At the time I thought it a good idea not to put all my eggs─or I guess in this case, my tools─in one basket.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find a worn artisan's tool inside the splintered crate.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You find a worn artisan's tool inside the rotting barrel.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You look inside the rotting barrel, but find nothing.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: Ah, this takes me back. I miss the hustle an' bustle this place used to be known for.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: There was a time when all the trade between Ul'dah an' the Near East passed through these streets. An endless procession o' caravans, an' I made sure those wagons were in tip-top shape to make their journey.

dialogue.name: GERBOD
dialogue.text: Soon enough the Resistance'll get things back to the way they were, an' you can bet your left leg I'll help 'em any way I can.
